properties.name: Tim Hortons
properties.wheelchair:description: There is handicapped parking located in front of the building in addition to an accessible ramp up onto the sidewalk. #DalOT #studentproject

properties.name: Spring Garden Café
properties.wheelchair:description: Manual door at entrance; Small ramp in front of entrance; Narrow aisles

properties.name: Dilly Dally Coffee Cafe
properties.wheelchair:description: Entrance around the side of the building next to the parking lot is accessible, and also has automatic door opener. Bathroom is accessible and quite spacious, but to access bathroom, have to pass multiple entrance ways. Cafe itself is very narrow.

properties.name: Staff of Life Bakery and Cafe
Tim Hortons
properties.wheelchair:description: #DalOT #studentproject

properties.name: World Tea House
properties.wheelchair:description: - Large washroom with hand rails #DalOT #StudentProject

properties.name: Wired Monk
properties.source: HRM open Data Halifax Regional Municipality
properties.wheelchair:description: Additional seating downstairs is not accessible. Side door on Barrington St has a ramp. Washroom is wheel chair accessible. #dalOT

properties.name: Tim Hortons
properties.wheelchair:description: *Doors at main entranceway have button activation. *Family bathroom not technically wheelchair accessible (inner width is 88cm) individuals in wheelchairs may still be able to use; male/female washrooms are not at all wheelchair accessible

properties.name: Trident Booksellers and Cafe
properties.wheelchair:description: Accessible doorway into restaurant. Doorway into bathroom is over 90cm wide. Hallway to bathroom was narrow but still >90cm. Greater than 150x150cm free space in bathroom. #DalOT #StudentProject

properties.name: Narrow Espresso
properties.source: HRM open Data Halifax Regional Municipality
properties.wheelchair:description: Steps on both ends of the entrance. Narrow hallway to washroom and the seating along the wall reduces the hallway even more. Washroom is inaccessible and opens out into narrow hall. #DalOT #studentproject

properties.name: Jane's Next Door
properties.source: HRM open Data Halifax Regional Municipality
properties.wheelchair:description: Entrance has accessible ramp but it is quite high grade; counter for mixing coffee is decently elevated; there is no washroom available for customer use, very small floor plan (could be an issue if there are many people inside)#DalOT #studentproject

properties.name: Alter Egos
properties.note: Cafe is wheelchair accessible, however, the hostel in the back is only partially accessible. The showers are not wheelchair accessible & the upper level is not wheelchair accessible.
properties.wheelchair:description: Wheelchair accessible cafe. The outside deck is not accessible as it as a 5 inch step. The bathroom entry is accessible, the space inside the bathroom is very limited and manoeuvring may prove to be difficult

properties.name: Java Blend
properties.wheelchair:description: Entrance to restaurant has a short 2.5cm lip and then a 5cm threshold at doorway. Main coffee shop was accessible. Bathroom is through the warehouse and up four steps when accessed from inside, but can be accessed via loading ramp from outside.

properties.name: Starbucks
properties.source: HRM open Data Halifax Regional Municipality
properties.wheelchair:description: Accessible parking and entrance. 1 step on emergency exit 5 inch high. Note: Women's washroom is not wheelchair accessible; men's washroom is wheelchair accessible. #dalOT #studentproject

properties.name: Tim Hortons
properties.wheelchair:description: Stairs that wrap around one side of building except one side where there is steep ramp. Narrow entranceway to bathroom with small space inside wheelchair bathroom. Hand railings present with accessible hand basin. #DalOT.

properties.name: Smiling Goat
properties.wheelchair:description: Good table height, easily movable chairs. Construction present near location 2015. Large paid parking lot near business accessible from location. Sidewalks level, in good condition.Ramp present from street. #DalOT #Studentproject

properties.name: Piece of Cake Bakery and Cafe
properties.wheelchair:description: Good table height. Chairs easily movable. Paid parking nearby, sidewalks accessible, level, in good condition. #DalOT #Studentproject

properties.name: Cabin Coffee
properties.wheelchair:description: Enough room for individual and their wheelchair. Servers are more than happy to help in anyway that they can.

properties.name: The Nook
properties.wheelchair:description: Washroom was narrow, no grab bars, no space under sink for wheelchair to fit. Floor plan is relatively open, a few booths with a step up that are not accessible as well as stool seating at a high bar. High counter for mixing coffee#DalOT #studentproject

properties.name: Grounded Espresso Bar
properties.wheelchair:description: Cafe in open space, in common walking area of Historic Properties. Counter slightly above 39", but signage is very high and legible. Staff very helpful and can help transport beverages to seating area close by. For washroom, require code from staff #DalOT

properties.name: Treats
properties.wheelchair:description: Toilet on bottom floor. No entrance, order from counter. Counter is low, able to order food and reach it. Menu is high and visible by all with clear lettering. Tables out front are small, but can be pulled up to. Garbage cans out front are low.

properties.name: Wild Leek Food & Juice Bar
properties.note: There is a small lip at the entrance (less than 7cm). Door does not have automatic door-opening mechanism. Washroom is not wheelchair accessible.
properties.source: HRM open Data Halifax Regional Municipality
properties.wheelchair:description: There is a small lip at the entrance (less than 7cm). Door does not have automatic door-opening mechanism. Washroom is not wheelchair accessible.

properties.name: Food Court of Spring Garden Place
properties.wheelchair:description: Located within Spring Garden Place Mall. Tables are well spread out and are regular height as opposed to bar height. There is a ramp between the two sections of the food court.

properties.name: Julien’s Bakery and Café
properties.wheelchair:description: Very open inside, a lot of room to manoeuver.

properties.name: Starbucks
properties.wheelchair:description: This Starbucks location is fully accessible. Each entrance is wide and equipped with automatic door activation controls. The bathroom door is also wide, the toilet is at an ideal height, and there are grab rails surrounding the toilet. #DalOT

properties.name: Glitter Bean Cafe
properties.wheelchair:description: There are 5 stairs after the entrance that lead to the main level. Bathroom is on the second level, which can only be accessed by a staircase. #DalOT #studentproject

properties.name: Board Room Game Cafe
properties.wheelchair:description: Separate wheelchair accessible entrance through main building using ramp and elevator to bottom floor. No wheelchair accessible button to open the bathroom door. #DatOT #StudentProject

properties.name: Tim Hortons
properties.wheelchair:description: Lots of seating at front or around back, wide hallways for manoeuvring. Harder to navigate during busy times with lineups.

properties.name: Humani-T
properties.source: HRM open Data Halifax Regional Municipality
properties.wheelchair:description: Front door is not automatic. once inside plenty of floor seating, with additional seating up one step. Fully accessible washroom, including vanity at 78cm tall and slanted mirror. #dalOT #studentproject #jennaandnicole

properties.name: Sully & Porter
properties.source: HRM open Data Halifax Regional Municipality;local knowledge

properties.name: Summit Cafe
properties.wheelchair:description: #DalOT #studentproject

properties.name: smiling goat
properties.source: HRM open Data Halifax Regional Municipality
properties.wheelchair:description: The door into the cafe is exactly 90cm and the door into the bathroom is exactly 90cm. The door into the cafe does not have an automatic door and the cafe itself is small. The tables are close together and would be difficult to maneuver a wheelchair.

properties.name: Tart & Soul
properties.wheelchair:description: Long, smooth ramp leading to entrance from sidewalk. Accessibility buttons to access main doors to building (Coburg Place). Friendly and accommodating staff. Wide spaces between tables. Fully accessible washroom with grab bars. #DalOT #StudentProject

properties.name: George's Bubble Tea
properties.source: HRM open Data Halifax Regional Municipality
properties.wheelchair:description: Entrance step is 10cm in height. Entrance doorway is 92cm (w) by 203cm (h). There is multiple stairs to get to bathroom and main dining area. #DalOT #StudentProject

properties.name: Starbucks
properties.source: HRM open Data Halifax Regional Municipality
properties.wheelchair:description: Main entrance - flat paved entry from the side walk and parking lot. Accessible washroom - grab bars, a low sink reachable from a seated position, a toilet of wheelchair height and an area clear of obstacles. #DalOT #StudentProject

properties.name: Café Tayaiki 52
properties.source: HRM open Data Halifax Regional Municipality

properties.source: HRM open Data Halifax Regional Municipality
